title: A Woman Greating a Man before her House in which a Man and A Woman Lay in Bed; Two Men Making Casks; A Man with Pigs and a Couple
description: A Woman Greating a Man before her House in which a Man and A Woman Lay in Bed; Two Men Making Casks; A Man with Pigs and a Couple; Unknown; Trier (probably), Germany; third quarter of 15th century; Pen and black ink and colored washes on paper; Leaf: 28.7 x 20.6 cm (11 5/16 x 8 1/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig XV 1, fol. 14; J.
